html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01322024-02-15FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAggregate borrowing limit for the 2023-24 fiscal year
PrecisOrder amending Order in Council P.C. 2023-273 of March 27, 2023 to 1) specify $517 billion to be the maximum aggregate principal amount of money which may be borrowed by the Minister of Finance in the 2023-2024 fiscal year to permit operations related to the management of the public debt; and 2) designate which officials from Finance Canada and the Bank of Canada are authorized to sign and countersign securities of Canada.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order amending Order in Council P.C. 2023-273 of March 27, 2023 to 1) specify $517 billion to be the maximum aggregate principal amount of money which may be borrowed by the Minister of Finance in the 2023-2024 fiscal year to permit operations related to the management of the public debt; and 2) designate which officials from Finance Canada and the Bank of Canada are authorized to sign and countersign securities of Canada.
